localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
blogPost.body: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
blogPost.title: Postpace - Productivity platform for writers, bloggers & teams
blogPost.author: Muntasir Rashid

localize.description: Postpace是一个生产力平台，供作家、博客作者、营销人员和团队自动化他们的主题研究工作流程，并快速构建内容摘要。Postpace通过分析来自Google的任意关键字的前15-20个有机结果来帮助研究主题。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和团队的生产力平台

localize.description: Postpace是一個生產力平臺，供作家、博客作者、營銷人員和團隊自動化他們的主題研究工作流程，並快速構建內容摘要。Postpace通過分析來自Google的任意關鍵字的前15-20個有機結果來幫助研究主題。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和團隊的生產力平臺

previous.excerpt: Startup goes MRRR - Parody on 'Printing Machine goes BRRR'. This is for all solo entrepreneurs, startup founders and indie hackers out there seeking that sweet MRR, that need a good laugh on this Friday.
previous.title: MRRR.money - Startup goes MRRRRR

localize.description: 创业者去MRRR--模仿 "打印机去BRRR"。这是为所有的个人创业者，创业创始人和独立黑客有寻求甜蜜的MRRR，需要一个很好的笑在这个星期五。
創業者去MRRR--模仿 "打印機去BRRR"。這是爲所有的個人創業者，創業創始人和獨立黑客有尋求甜蜜的MRRR，需要一個很好的笑在這個星期五。

next.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isn’t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
next.title: Presearch - A Better Search Engine - Support decentralized search by becoming a node operator.

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和开放的互联网，而不是由少数大科技公司主导？现在，你可以通过运营一个Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成为革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成为节点运营商。

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和開放的互聯網，而不是由少數大科技公司主導？現在，你可以通過運營一個Presearch節點，幫助推動Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成爲革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成爲節點運營商。
